triRatio Manual
1. select file(s) by clicking "...". Importing 3 files in once is possible.
2. clicking "run" to run analysis.
3. shift + RightClick (drag) on theta-phi map for range selection.
4. shift + RightClick (double click) for canceling selection.
5. RightClick on theta-phi map and 2D image for saving the corresponding image.
5. Control Bar on bottom right can filter out selected points with small r.
6. SUM/Co/Fe/Mn buttons switches the display of 2D image (SUM=Co+Fe+Mn)
7. rmax/points/weight buttons switches the display of theta-phi map (weight=rmax*points)
